response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It's not just an item; it's an investment that could significantly enhance your business operations and profitability. Given its value to you, we believe it's worth more than what you've mentioned it's worth to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, we're offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a unique opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. We look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 950000}
